description: Demolition of existing buildings; erection of a basement and a five - nine storey building fronting London Road and Sumner Road, comprising 2 Class A1(retail) units and a Class D2 (Assembly & Leisure) unit on part of lower and upper ground floors with 59 two bedroom and 91 one bedroom flats in remainder of building and ancillary car, motorbike and cycle  parking; provision of rear service road with access from Sumner Road.
